mapper.select: SELECT p.pid, p.name, p.style_name, p.self_name, i.portrait FROM gen_person p LEFT JOIN gen_person_info i ON p.pid = i.pid WHERE p.name LIKE '%${simplifiedName}%' OR p.name LIKE '%${traditionalName}%' OR p.style_name LIKE '%${simplifiedName}%' OR p.style_name LIKE '%${traditionalName}%' OR p.self_name LIKE '%${simplifiedName}%' OR p.self_name LIKE '%${traditionalName}%'
